item.title: Best Mini-ITX Cases for 2025
item.description: When building a compact yet powerful PC, choosing the right Mini-ITX case is essential. In 2025, manufacturers have pushed the envelope with designs that not only maximize space efficiency but also ensure excellent airflow, cable management, and aesthetic appeal. In this article, weâ€™ll take an in-depth look at the best Mini-ITX cases for 2025, highlighting their key features, pros, and cons to help you find the perfect match for your next build.
